name: Classic Maze Game - 10000+ LVL
description:
Run as fast as you can to escape from the labyrinth!

+ Fun and addicting gameplay with challenging puzzles : classic mazes, dark mazes & circle mazes!
+ Many exciting levels with more levels on the way: 10000+ unique levels!
+ Simple controls, just swipe anywhere on the screen the direction you want the avatar to go OR tap the arrows of available directions
+ Zoom & Drag to watch the whole huge maze
+ Universal support that looks and plays great on both phones and tablets
+ Unlockable avatars
+ Unlockable themes
+ Fun for all ages
+ Awesome level-ups to give you the pleasure with your progress
